explains: v. 否认；拒绝承认；拒绝给予
wordGroup: deny something to someone deny someone something 拒绝给予
deny access 拒绝访问；不让进入

sentences.en: Who can deny the justice of their cause?
sentences.cn: 谁能否认他们的追求是合理的呢？

sentences.en: The White House was swift to deny the rumours.
sentences.cn: 白宫立刻对这些传言予以否认。

sentences.en: My instinctive reaction was to deny everything.
sentences.cn: 我的本能反应是否认一切。
